name: Draid (itch)
description:
Draid is a Druid, that lives in a peaceful forest, until one day a huge meteor fell from the sky and an evil creature come out of it.

Draid stops everything he’s doing and goes out to investigate what disrupts the harmony in the forest.

While on the adventure, Draid will pass through the forest and other scenery. He will help his friends on the way to the evil creature and will learn about his hidden skills. 

The adventure will not be easy and Draid will have to overcome many challenges in his way.

We are a small team of 5 people that are trying to make old school games to come back to life.

Draid is the best example for that, as you can see we took a couple of old platformer video games and made a game that have classic mechanics but with fresh graphics.

The full game release will be at 1st February, 2019  and you could buy it for a small price.

Here is a link to the demo of the game on steam:  Draid - Demo

As well you can enter to our site: https://www.bulletbears.com
